form.official-title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 regarding reasonable break time for nursing mothers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Supporting Working Moms Act of 2015.

section.header: Reasonable break time for nursing mothers
section.text: Section 13(a) of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 (29 U.S.C. 213(a)) is amended by striking sections 6 (except section 6(d) in the case of paragraph (1) of this subsection) and 7 and inserting sections 6 and 7 (except sections 6(d) and 7(r) in the case of paragraph (1) of this subsection).
